text: Ani allahace ani tyacya rasula (paigambara) ce ajnapalana karita raha, apasata matabheda thevu naka, an'yatha bhyada va bhitre vhala, ani tumaca paya dalamalita ho'ila ani tumaca joma nahisa ho'ila ani dhairya-sanyama va visvasa rakha. Nihsansaya allaha dhira-sanyama rakhanaryancya pathisi ahe
